arknights_items.name: EXP
arknights_items.description: Good job. Keep it up and get stronger. As long as you don't give up, your efforts will pay off in the end.
arknights_items.usage: Experience gained from battle. It shows how far you've come.

arknights_items.name: Credit
arknights_items.description: Credit holds communities together and stands as a symbol of social stability. Sometimes it's even more valuable than money, so do please cherish it.
arknights_items.usage: A token of friendship. Can be used to exchange items from the Store.

arknights_items.name: Sanity
arknights_items.description: 'What is it that distinguishes us from this land? Our breath, or feeling? Or life and death?'
arknights_items.usage: The mental capacity to remain self aware, draw up plans, and execute them.

arknights_items.name: Drill Plan
arknights_items.description: Haste makes waste. For Rhodes Island, every operation has the potential for a loss of life. Therefore, it is wise to drill before actual combat, long before we run into an enemy ambush.
arknights_items.usage: A plan used for tactical drills. Use it on the operation interface to simulate a battle so you can make plans accordingly.

arknights_items.name: Drone
arknights_items.description: Drones used for construction. They are controlled by the Rhodes Island Logistics Department. Without them, Operators would have to wait 10 times as long to get base housing.
arknights_items.usage: A machine that is important for the Base construction of Rhodes Island. Can be used to clean, construct, and upgrade base facilities.

arknights_items.name: Preregister to get 1 of 4 Operators randomly
arknights_items.description: Who will it be? Can't wait!
arknights_items.usage: Used to get preregistration rewards.

arknights_items.name: Originite Prime
arknights_items.description: Widely used in industry, this Originium crystal is difficult to extract. Its production requires very fine processing, but it remains the major energy source of the world and the foundation of Originium Arts. Even if widespread rumors claim 'Originite Prime spreads an incurable disease,' few can resist its temptation.
arknights_items.usage: Dangerous but necessary, this precious material is widely used across many fields.

arknights_items.name: Orundum
arknights_items.description: Made from Originite Prime, it also contains other minerals. In the past, it was used only as a conductive element, but it has since become a store of credit value.
arknights_items.usage: An artificial material commonly used to recruit operators.

arknights_items.name: Originium Shard
arknights_items.description: An Originium shard collected from heavily contaminated regions. Anyone who touches it has a high chance to get infected and even mutate. Therefore, it is a hazardous material as indicated in the Columbia CDC toxicity database.
arknights_items.usage: An Originium shard collected from polluted regions. Can be used to produce Orundum.

arknights_items.name: LMD
arknights_items.description: Since the financial crisis, economic decline and political instability have stood in the way of trade. The widespread circulation of Lungmen Dollars has allowed for some recovery in the business world.
arknights_items.usage: A widely used currency issued by Lungmen.

arknights_items.name: Pure Gold
arknights_items.description: How much ore does it take to make such valuable gold bars? It doesn't matter. What matters is that they're yours.
arknights_items.usage: A refined gold bar. Can be exchanged for a lot of LMD.

arknights_items.name: Distinction Certificate
arknights_items.description: The Infection Isolation Act is the last vestige of modern nation states. As long as you have some special ability, it is but a meaningless piece of paper. (The words of her Leithanien mentor.)
arknights_items.usage: A certificate that attests to an operator’s distinguished accomplishments and expertise. Can be exchanged for rare items.

arknights_items.name: Commendation Certificate
arknights_items.description: Good help is hard to find in troubled times, especially when trying to do it secretly. It's like finding a needle in a haystack, but what if Rhodes Island were to become the haystack? Would that save some time?
arknights_items.usage: A certificate that attests to an operator’s skills and qualifications. Can be exchanged for items.

arknights_items.name: Shop Voucher
arknights_items.description: The operations at Rhodes Island require substantial funding and a variety of materials. Therefore, we must trade in diverse markets in order to keep everything running
arknights_items.usage: A certificate describing the business and operational capacities of Rhodes Island. Can be exchanged for items.

arknights_items.name: Headhunting Data Contract
arknights_items.description: A long-term, stable relationship with the headhunting agency can effectively control our expenditures. However, we hope that this method will not be required every time.
arknights_items.usage: A time-limited currency arranged for a new type of headhunting contract; Collect enough to recruit an operator from a designated pool for a limited time

arknights_items.name: Headhunting Data Contract
arknights_items.description: A long-term, stable relationship with the headhunting agency can effectively control our expenditures. However, we hope that this method will not be required every time.
arknights_items.usage: A time-limited currency arranged for a new type of headhunting contract; Collect enough to recruit an operator from a designated pool for a limited time

arknights_items.name: Headhunting Data Contract
arknights_items.description: A long-term, stable relationship with the headhunting agency can effectively control our expenditures. However, we hope that this method will not be required every time.
arknights_items.usage: A time-limited currency arranged for a new type of headhunting contract; Collect enough to recruit an operator from a designated pool for a limited time

arknights_items.name: Headhunting Data Contract
arknights_items.description: A long-term, stable relationship with the headhunting agency can effectively control our expenditures. However, we hope that this method will not be required every time.
arknights_items.usage: A time-limited currency arranged for a new type of headhunting contract; Collect enough to recruit an operator from a designated pool for a limited time

arknights_items.name: Headhunting Parametric Model
arknights_items.description: The fact that the headhunting agency has taken this consideration proves its sincerity. A word of warning though - if you seek to exploit this method for profit, I'm afraid the consequences will far outweigh any gains.
arknights_items.usage: A new product, born of processing data from expired headhunting contracts; Can be exchanged for certain supplies.

arknights_items.name: Intelligence Certificate
arknights_items.description: In order to encourage Operators to proactively replay and review past events, upper management decided to initiate long-term activities that would grant a voucher for replaying prior operations. The voucher can be taken to the HR Department to exchange for various supplies, and the designated events are randomly selected by the system.
arknights_items.usage: A reward for reviewing past events; Can be used to exchange for various supplies.

arknights_items.name: Contract Bounty
arknights_items.description: The ruthless but effective bounty mechanism is the only way to ensure the normal operations of the Contingency Contract system.
arknights_items.usage: Rewards earned after completing a contract. Can be used to redeem supplies.

arknights_items.name: Epic Medic Token
arknights_items.description: A special token. All the efforts taken to get your hands on it will prove to be worth it.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of ★5 Medic Operators.

arknights_items.name: Information Fragments
arknights_items.description:
An auxiliary function of Rhodes Island's intelligence processing system. After extracting effective intelligence from a complex batch of information,  the system was able to recreate images of past events with astonishing fidelity.
The information was packaged as videotapes to make it easier for ordinary people to understand.
arknights_items.usage: A topological model of effective intelligence that can be used to reconstruct past events.

arknights_items.name: ID Info Update Card
arknights_items.description: Don't waste the precious chance to do a system update.
arknights_items.usage: ID Info Update Card for a system upgrade to the Rhodes Island bridge. This one is for you, Doctor.

arknights_items.name: Top Emergency Sanity Potion
arknights_items.description: It contains a small amount of mustard extract, so please keep it away from your eyes (other instructions omitted). When the situation is so dire that you need to use it to restore Sanity, you won't have the time to read this. Good luck!
arknights_items.usage: A large dose of emergency supplement that will swiftly clear your mind. Possible side effect: migraine.

arknights_items.name: Emergency Sanity Potion
arknights_items.description: Although overeating can relieve the anxiety and pressure accumulated on the battlefield, it's not a healthy lifestyle, Doctor. This supplement contains quite a bit of sugar, but the packing is specially designed to be hard to open. Treat it as a kind of exercise and burn some calories.
arknights_items.usage: An emergency supplement used to maintain Sanity and keep your mind clear.

arknights_items.name: Emergency Sanity Sampler
arknights_items.description: A couple blond Fortes are selling gold pieces of paper at three times the stated price. This voucher can be used to buy aid packages for competition knights in the arena, or as a bankroll to bet on, but be prepared to pay more than the number printed on it. A piece of paper, a huge sum, a knight's life of honor and shame.
arknights_items.usage: A portable , easy-to-carry sampler that is good for maintaining a level of Sanity during emergencies.

arknights_items.name: Ten-roll Headhunting Permit
arknights_items.description: When Rhodes Island is need of skilled operators, our normal permits may not make efficient use of our headhunting company contractors. In order to accelerate the development of Rhodes Island, the Human Resource Department has issued these permits for headhunting in batches.
arknights_items.usage: A permit issued by the Human Resource Department of Rhodes Island. Can be used to recruit 10 Operators at a time through headhunting companies.

arknights_items.name: Awakening Commemoration Permit
arknights_items.description: In order to ensure the available talent pool can be scaled upwards to satisfy the Doctor's emergency preparation request, this batch of headhunting items carries specificity, time-sensitivity, and of course, a degree of risk.
arknights_items.usage: A batch headhunting permit issued by the Rhodes Island HR Department; Can be used at a certain time to recruit talented Operators, 10 rolls at once.

arknights_items.name: Memorial-Limited Headhunting Permit
arknights_items.description: In order to ensure the available talent pool can be scaled upwards to satisfy the Doctor's emergency preparation request, this batch of headhunting items carries specificity, time-sensitivity, and of course, a degree of risk.
arknights_items.usage: A batch headhunting permit issued by the Rhodes Island HR Department; Can be used at a certain time to recruit talented Operators, 10 rolls at once.

arknights_items.name: Tide on Sunset Headhunting Permit
arknights_items.description: In order to ensure the available talent pool can be scaled upwards to satisfy the Doctor's emergency preparation request, this batch of headhunting items carries specificity, time-sensitivity, and of course, a degree of risk.
arknights_items.usage: A batch headhunting permit issued by the Rhodes Island HR Department; Can be used at a certain time to recruit talented Operators, 10 rolls at once.

arknights_items.name: Headhunting Permit
arknights_items.description: Compared to Rhodes Island, headhunting companies have more contacts and resources. They are probably more capable of finding skilled operators in all fields, which is why the Human Resource Department is willing to pay their exorbitant commissions.
arknights_items.usage: A permit issued by the Human Resource Department of Rhodes Island. Can be used to recruit an Operator through headhunting companies.

arknights_items.name: Recruitment Permit
arknights_items.description: Our colleagues in the Human Resource Department have to manage a deluge of information each and every day, but they always manage to dig out Rhodes Island's diamonds from the rough.
arknights_items.usage: A permit issued by the Human Resource Department of Rhodes Island. Can be used to recruit an Operator through public channels.

arknights_items.name: Expedited Plan
arknights_items.description: Anyone who receives this permit, please report to the Rhodes Island Human Resource Department immediately!
arknights_items.usage: An expedited permit issued by the Human Resource Department of Rhodes Island. Can be used to recruit an Operator through special channels.

arknights_items.name: Operator Exchange Voucher
arknights_items.description: A couple blond Fortes are selling gold pieces of paper at three times the stated price. This voucher can be used to buy aid packages for competition knights in the arena, or as a bankroll to bet on, but be prepared to pay more than the number printed on it. A piece of paper, a huge sum, a knight's life of honor and shame.
arknights_items.usage: Used to exchange for an Operator.

arknights_items.name: Vulcan and Indra Recruitment Voucher
arknights_items.description: Allows you to select between one of the 5-star Recruitment-exclusive Operators: Indra and Vulcan.
arknights_items.usage: Used to exchange for an Operator.

arknights_items.name: Top Operator Transfer Permit
arknights_items.description: Allows you to select a 6-star Operator from a past Headhunting Pool up to and including 'Enthusiasm, Expansion, Explosion.'
arknights_items.usage: A transfer permit for senior and top operators issued by the HR Department; a lot of preparation work went into making this possible, as it is nearly impossible to find guaranteed help.

arknights_items.name: Thank-You Celebration Operator Permit
arknights_items.description: Allows you to select a non-limited 6-star Operator from a past Headhunting Pool up to and including 'Illusions of the Past.'
arknights_items.usage: A transfer permit for senior and top operators issued by the HR Department; a lot of preparation work went into making this possible, as it is nearly impossible to find guaranteed help.

arknights_items.name: Type-α Headhunting Permit
arknights_items.description: Due to various strategic considerations, Rhodes Island conducted targeted headhunting in addition to batch recruitment in order to seek assistance from individuals with special talents.
arknights_items.usage: A special permit issued by the Rhodes Island HR Department with specific instructions for the headhunting agency. Can be used to headhunt for 10 Operators.

arknights_items.name: Type-β Headhunting Permit
arknights_items.description: Due to various strategic considerations, Rhodes Island conducted targeted headhunting in addition to batch recruitment in order to seek assistance from individuals with special talents.
arknights_items.usage: A special permit issued by the Rhodes Island HR Department with specific instructions for the headhunting agency. Can be used to headhunt for 10 Operators.

arknights_items.name: Popukar's Token
arknights_items.description: A solid metal toy. It's particularly heavy and hard to destroy.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Popukar.

arknights_items.name: Type-γ Headhunting Permit
arknights_items.description: Due to various strategic considerations, Rhodes Island conducted targeted headhunting in addition to batch recruitment in order to seek assistance from individuals with special talents.

arknights_items.name: Operation Barrenland Supplies
arknights_items.description: A supply crate from the Contingency Contract network. Provides a bit of a reward to those who work hard to heal this land. -Contingency Contract
arknights_items.usage: Filled with an assortment of supplies and materials.

arknights_items.name: Operation Pyrite Supplies
arknights_items.description: A supply crate from the Contingency Contract network. Provides a bit of a reward to those who work hard to heal this land. -Contingency Contract

arknights_items.usage: Filled with an assortment of supplies and materials.

arknights_items.name: Rhodes Island Supplies
arknights_items.description: Rhodes Island purchases and stores boxes of supplies from various places. However, due to the lack of an organized storage system, each box contains seemingly random materials.
arknights_items.usage: Filled with an assortment of supplies and materials.

arknights_items.name: New Year's Lantern
arknights_items.description: Lanterns hung up during the passing of the old year and the arrival of the new. Within them are recent memories, puzzles and riddles, and even tales from the distant past.
arknights_items.usage: A collection of supplies and materials collected through the New Year.

arknights_items.name: 32-hour Strategic Ration
arknights_items.description: A pack of rations containing various resources and supplies. In more ways than one, its appearance provides glimpses into the battle that transpired in the heart of Chernobog. Even looking at it now fills one's heart with a lingering dread.
arknights_items.usage: A pack of rations to commemorate your one-year return to Rhodes Island. Contains a variety of random supplies.

arknights_items.name: Thank-You Celebration Supplies
arknights_items.description: Rhodes Island purchases and stores boxes of supplies from various places. However, due to the lack of an organized storage system, each box contains seemingly random materials.
arknights_items.usage: Filled with an assortment of supplies and materials.

arknights_items.name: Half Year Anniversary Red Envelope
arknights_items.description: Nobody knows who ended up footing the bill. What we do know is the hope they have for Rhodes Island.
arknights_items.usage: Red envelopes passed out to every member of Rhodes Island. The goods inside may be random, but they are always filled to the brim with blessings.

arknights_items.name: Celebratory Box
arknights_items.description: Nobody knows who ended up footing the bill. What we do know is the hope they have for Rhodes Island.
arknights_items.usage: Gift boxes distributed to all members of Rhodes Island, random in amount, and full of the joy that comes with celebration.

arknights_items.name: Drill Battle Record
arknights_items.description:
In such a hostile environment, every operation has the potential for a loss of life. We may be able to save more people if we are well prepared.
A video record of several battles.
arknights_items.usage: A device that stores battle videos. Gives Operators a slight amount of EXP.

arknights_items.name: Frontline Battle Record
arknights_items.description:
In such a hostile environment, every operation has the potential for a loss of life. We may be able to save more people if we are well prepared.
A video record of several battles, with detailed statistical analysis, plus 3 hours of additional materials and interviews.
arknights_items.usage: A device that stores battle videos. Gives Operators a moderate amount of EXP.

arknights_items.name: Tactical Battle Record
arknights_items.description:
In such a hostile environment, every operation has the potential for a loss of life. We may be able to save more people if we are well prepared.
A video record of several battles, plus the signature of the one who recorded them.
arknights_items.usage: A device that stores battle videos. Gives Operators a significant amount of EXP.

Comes with a collector's edition, a HD version, an HD remastered version, an Enhanced edition, a Director's cut edition, an Annual Gold edition...
arknights_items.usage: A device that stores battle videos. Gives Operators a huge amount of EXP.

arknights_items.name: Skill Summary - 1
arknights_items.description: It records entry-level skills needed by Operators. Even a dummy could master the techniques after a bit of study.
arknights_items.usage: A book that records basic tactics. Can be used to upgrade Operator skills.

arknights_items.name: Skill Summary - 2
arknights_items.description: It records junior skills needed by Operators. It takes some time and effort to master them.
arknights_items.usage: A book that records intermediate tactics. Can be used to upgrade Operator skills.

arknights_items.name: Skill Summary - 3
arknights_items.description: It records high level skills needed by Operators. It takes a depth of experience in relevant fields to understand them.
arknights_items.usage: A book that records advanced tactics. Can be used to upgrade Operator skills.

arknights_items.name: Orirock
arknights_items.description: Rich in organics, it is commonly seen in regions where Originium has completely volatilized. Compared to Originium, it is easier to exploit.
arknights_items.usage: A rock mined from the ground. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

arknights_items.name: Orirock Concentration

arknights_items.name: Damaged Device
arknights_items.description: A broken device that was embedded in the enemy's weapons and armor. It got damaged during a fierce fight, but the components inside are still valuable.

arknights_items.description: After undergoing a large number of private modifications, these devices have greatly expanded capacity, which improves performance at the cost of stability. From this, one can feel the dedication and perseverance from the makers.

arknights_items.name: Ester
arknights_items.description: One of the most important materials in modern industry. Its appearance has lead to the development of many modern products. This one, of course, is only a raw material that has practical application.
arknights_items.usage: Ester used in industrial production. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

arknights_items.name: Polyester
arknights_items.description: Although its is lacking in potency, it can still be used to produce some basic materials we need. It is also a common ingredient in some sustained-release drugs.

arknights_items.name: Loxic Kohl
arknights_items.description: An outstanding chemical mediator. When in use, it often changes between two forms to store and release other materials. When it becomes liquid, some of its properties are the same as those of alcohol, which often leaves our Engineer Operators tipsy.
arknights_items.usage: A flaky organic compound. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

arknights_items.description: A product made from Loxic Kohl after fine processing. It was named after the company that discovered its production method. Experiments show that it tends to transform to a higher structure in abnormal environments.
arknights_items.usage: A flaky organic compound. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and the synthesis of Bipolar Nanoflake.

arknights_items.name: Manganese Ore
arknights_items.description: A metal that is used to produce a catalyst widely used in industries. As the reprocessing is complicated, accidents caused by nonstandard techniques do happen from time to time.
arknights_items.usage: A metal ore used for metallurgy. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

arknights_items.description: A precious metal which few companies are willing to use to produce industrial catalysts. The catalyst made from it, however, has an extremely long service life. It can be used repeatedly and even stripped and recycled, but the complicated processes have forced many companies to give up.
arknights_items.usage: A metal ore used for metallurgy. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and the synthesis of D32 Steel.

arknights_items.name: Grindstone
arknights_items.description: An important tool in component processing. It has stable properties, and will never explode, powderize, or crack.
arknights_items.usage: A grindstone used to process weapon parts. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

arknights_items.usage: An advanced grindstone used in the finish machining of weapon parts. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and the synthesis of D32 Steel.

arknights_items.name: RMA70-12
arknights_items.description: A mineral whose natural form is a complicated polyhedron. Its value for Originium Arts was known long before its industrial value.
arknights_items.usage: A sensitive mineral with high conductivity. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for production in the Factory.

arknights_items.name: RMA70-24
arknights_items.description: A mineral whose natural form is a complicated polyhedron. Found in 1024, it shows great industrial value that other minerals used for Originium Arts lack.
arknights_items.usage: A highly sensitive mineral with outstanding conductivity. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and the synthesis of D32 Steel.

arknights_items.name: Polymerization Preparation
arknights_items.description: A material commonly used as an isolation coating for delicate equipment. Its bonding effect is strong enough to interrupt the volatilization of Originium.
arknights_items.usage: A complicated liquid industrial product. Can be used for high level upgrades.

arknights_items.name: Bipolar Nanoflake
arknights_items.description: A device that is sensitive to Originium within a certain range. It can significantly improve the sensitive of nearby weapons and equipment to Originium, making them near vessels for Originium Arts.
arknights_items.usage: The brainchild of modern science and industry. Can be used for high level upgrades.

arknights_items.name: D32 Steel
arknights_items.description: This material can deliver Originium Arts smoothly and its amazing hardness makes it impossible to penetrate. It will set a new standard for weapon materials.
arknights_items.usage: An artificial metal that doesn't exist in nature. Can be used for high level upgrades.

arknights_items.name: Coagulating Gel
arknights_items.description: An artificial material serendipitously born in the laboratory. It has excellent resistance to extreme temperatures, is lightweight, and is easy to process, making it ideal for use in high-tech projects.
arknights_items.usage: A high-strength plastic material suitable. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for synthesis projects in Factories.

arknights_items.name: Polymerized Gel
arknights_items.description: An artificial material created from a large number of experiments using coagulating gel as a base material. It can maintain its stability even in high-pressure environments, playing a key role in some high-tech projects.
arknights_items.usage: An extremely high-strength plastic material. Can be used for a variety of upgrades.

arknights_items.name: Incandescent Alloy
arknights_items.description: An alloy smelted from several rare Terran metals. Used to manufacture rare electronic components and circuit boards, it has become an indispensable material in the cutting-edge electronics industry.
arknights_items.usage: A special alloy with a high melting point, commonly used in the electronics industry. Can be used for a variety of upgrades and for synthesis projects in Factories.

arknights_items.name: Incandescent Alloy Block
arknights_items.description: A product derived from further processing of incandescent alloy. After complicated industrial processing, the stability of its solid-liquid hybridization state at certain temperatures has been preserved. As a result, it has an irreplaceable role in product development in the cutting-edge electronics industry.
arknights_items.usage: A rarely-produced alloy with a high melting point, commonly used in the electronics industry. Can be used for a variety of upgrades.

arknights_items.name: Crystalline Component
arknights_items.description: A raw industrial material made with the outer shell of an Originium crystal. A fundamental product in the modern Originium electronics industry.
arknights_items.usage: An important Originium industry material. Can be used for a variety of upgrades. Can be manufactured and assembled into more advanced Originium electric components.

arknights_items.name: Crystalline Circuit
arknights_items.description: A core product in the modern Originium electronics industry. Found inside electronic goods far and wide throughout Terra's nations. The mass application of crystalline circuitry is one more reminder of Terra's industrial modernization.
arknights_items.usage: An important Originium industry material. Can be used for a variety of upgrades. A fundamental part of manufacturing Originium crystal assemblies.

arknights_items.name: Crystalline Electronic Unit
arknights_items.description: A crystallization of Terra's Originium technology. A symbol of Terra's industrial modernization. From Originium Casting units to intercity network servers, their making all starts with inventions like these.
arknights_items.usage: An expensive Originium industry product. Can be used for major upgrades.

arknights_items.name: Keel
arknights_items.description: The foundation of the entire construction operation at Rhodes Island. Although this giant, complicated component must be custom made or ordered, for some reason, Rhodes Island often uses it to build special facilities.
arknights_items.usage: A delicate artificial component used as the core material of Base construction.

arknights_items.name: Furniture Part
arknights_items.description: Table legs, chair arms, cushions, we have everything here. Put them together and you get a nice piece of furniture.
arknights_items.usage: Parts used to assemble furniture.

arknights_items.name: Light Building Material
arknights_items.description: Room modification causes irreversible damage to load bearing parts if not handled properly. Please use building materials before commencing modification in order to guarantee the integrity of the room.
arknights_items.usage: A basic construction material used for the facility development of Rhodes Island.

arknights_items.name: Concrete Building Material
arknights_items.description: Before conducting modifications to rooms with poor structural integrity, please use this building material for maintenance to ensure the safety of the work site. Only then will you be ready to begin.
arknights_items.usage: A strengthened construction material used for the facility development of Rhodes Island.

arknights_items.name: Reinforced Building Material
arknights_items.description: Please do not waste time with stress tests on rooms strengthened by this material! None of the currently employed demolition methods can damage the structural integrity of these rooms, but they may be dangerous to the experimenters.
arknights_items.usage: An advanced construction material used for the facility development of Rhodes Island.

arknights_items.name: Carbon Stick

arknights_items.usage: A carbon stick used for the facility development of Rhodes Island.

arknights_items.name: Carbon Brick
arknights_items.description: Light and highly pure, it possesses excellent workability, and is instrumental to the success of our operations.

arknights_items.description: A first aid spray kit whose box has a label 'Effective Immediately.' It can be added to medical equipment or used directly.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Lancet-2.

arknights_items.name: Castle-3's Token
arknights_items.description: A hard, portable armor piece without an instruction manual.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Castle-3.

arknights_items.name: THRM-EX's Token
arknights_items.description: A luminous heat storage core; The following is imprinted on the package in bold, black letters: 'FEEL THE PASSION!'
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of THRM-EX.

arknights_items.name: Yato's Token
arknights_items.description: A yellowing, incomplete book that lies in a lacquer box. It records the most challenging skill of swordsmanship: inner peace.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Yato.

arknights_items.name: Noir Corne's Token
arknights_items.description: A timeworn mask used during sacrificial festivals. The hollow eye sockets bore witness to the birth of the land.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Noir Corne.

arknights_items.name: Rangers' Token
arknights_items.description: Two pieces of flint strung together. It was from these small things that civilization was born.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Rangers.

arknights_items.name: Durin's Token
arknights_items.description: A small Originium product made by a Durinese craftsman. Hold it tightly for a while and you will suddenly feel full of energy.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Durin.

arknights_items.name: 12F's Token
arknights_items.description: A piece of chocolate wrapped in old packaging. The words 'Merry Christmas' are written on the back, barely legible.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of 12F.

arknights_items.name: Fang's Token
arknights_items.description: A pair of running shoes that fit your feet perfectly. The person who gave you this must have spent a lot of effort asking you to join her on her morning exercise routine.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Fang.

arknights_items.name: Vanilla's Token
arknights_items.description: A wild animal map of the Vouivre Boundary Grassland. The marks on it are disappearing one after another as the engines of mobile cities roar.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Vanilla.

arknights_items.name: Plume's Token
arknights_items.description: A formal hat decorated with a modest amount of feathers. It is suitable for all Laterano festivals.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Plume.

arknights_items.name: Melantha's Token
arknights_items.description: Simply wrapped candles. The special fragrance they emit is unforgettable.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Melantha.

arknights_items.name: Cardigan's Token
arknights_items.description: A sled made of hard wood. It makes you look forward to seeing snow.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Cardigan.

arknights_items.name: Beagle's Token
arknights_items.description: Transcripts neatly placed inside a folder. They all show straight A's.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Beagle.

arknights_items.name: Kroos's Token
arknights_items.description: A collection of shooting toys, including a plastic bow, several sucker arrows and an apple to be used as a target.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Kroos.

arknights_items.name: Adnachiel's Token
arknights_items.description: A furry hat that won't fit on a Sankta's head.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Adnachiel.

arknights_items.name: Lava's Token
arknights_items.description: A specially processed sheath. It is covered in deliberately mysterious patterns.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Lava.

arknights_items.name: Hibiscus's Token
arknights_items.description: A daily schedule custom made for your own healthy living. To be honest, it's hard to reject it.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Hibiscus.

arknights_items.name: Ansel's Token
arknights_items.description: A portable blood pressure meter. Hope you can take good care of yourself even without a medic around.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ansel.

arknights_items.name: Steward's Token
arknights_items.description: A trendy sport armlet. Looks like it's a simple version with only one color.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Steward.

arknights_items.name: Orchid's Token
arknights_items.description: A delicate pen that has been lovingly packaged. It feels like working in a office building when you use it to review documents.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Orchid.

arknights_items.name: Catapult's Token
arknights_items.description: A nameplate worn only by soldiers. Now that she is free, she has handed over her glory to you.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Catapult.

arknights_items.name: Midnight's Token
arknights_items.description: A delicate goblet. Under the yellow light, it gives off intoxicating colors.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Midnight.

arknights_items.name: Spot's Token
arknights_items.description: A slang dictionary. It tells how to be gently sarcastic in the languages of several countries.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Spot.

arknights_items.name: Gitano's Token
arknights_items.description: A card from a divination deck. Although you already know its meaning, you make your own future.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Gitano.

arknights_items.name: Jessica's Token
arknights_items.description: A photo commemorating Jessica's entry into Blacksteel. It represents the start of a new life.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Jessica.

arknights_items.name: Meteor's Token
arknights_items.description: A garland made of twigs that seem to never wither. The forest of Kazimierz is asking in a low voice when its guardian will return.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Meteor.

arknights_items.name: Shirayuki's Token
arknights_items.description: A calligraphic work whose ink has not yet dried. It's a blessing for Rhodes Island.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Shirayuki.

arknights_items.name: Courier's Token
arknights_items.description: A bottle of malt liquor found somewhere far away. Under the sunlight, the golden liquid shines inside the glass bottle.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Courier.

arknights_items.name: Scavenger's Token
arknights_items.description: A silver coin. Maybe you can use it to decide something important.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Scavenger.

arknights_items.name: Vigna's Token
arknights_items.description: An electric guitar for daily practice. A request to take it onto the battlefield was denied.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Vigna.

arknights_items.name: Dobermann's Token
arknights_items.description: A red pamphlet. It records a tough battle.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Dobermann.

arknights_items.name: Matoimaru's Token
arknights_items.description: A pair of soft blinders. It's nice to put it on at bedtime.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Matoimaru.

arknights_items.name: Frostleaf's Token
arknights_items.description: A vocabulary book that looks timeworn due to overuse. Detailed marks that look like doodles fill the margins of every page.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Frostleaf.

arknights_items.name: Estelle's Token
arknights_items.description: A stone comb. It feels cool and emits a slight flowery fragrance.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Estelle.

arknights_items.name: Mousse's Token
arknights_items.description: An album whose cover is decorated with golden floral patterns. The photos inside record the 'kitties' that played with the photographer. Kitties!
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mousse.

arknights_items.name: Gravel's Token
arknights_items.description: A badly worn Kazimierz knight badge. No matter what happened in the past, seizing the here and now is what really matters.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Gravel.

arknights_items.name: Rope's Token
arknights_items.description: An expensive ornament whose price tag is still on it. Is it really okay to take it...?
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Rope.

arknights_items.name: Myrrh's Token
arknights_items.description: A pill made from multiple herbs. It will come in handy when you fall ill. Besides, every pill is carefully coated.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Myrrh.

arknights_items.name: Gavial's Token
arknights_items.description: A set of massage tools. They help manage the tiredness from those weird healing Arts.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Gavial.

arknights_items.name: Perfumer's Token
arknights_items.description: A double ear vase in the style of the Minos civilization. The owner must regularly replace the old flowers with new ones.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Perfumer.

arknights_items.name: Matterhorn's Token
arknights_items.description: A wooden statue that looks a bit rough. It is lowering its head, which gives a peaceful impression.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Matterhorn.

arknights_items.name: Cuora's Token
arknights_items.description: A normal baseball bat bearing the illegible autographs of several famous players on it. Maybe, perhaps, those signatures are fake, but the desire to share them is real.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Cuora.

arknights_items.name: Gummy's Token
arknights_items.description: A discount coupon for Gummy's Breakfast Kitchen. Does -100% mean it's free...?
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Gummy.

arknights_items.name: Deepcolor's Token
arknights_items.description: A freehand fairy tale storybook. The main character, after traveling between life and death, finally steps into the river at the end.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Deepcolor.

arknights_items.name: Earthspirit's Token
arknights_items.description: A small piece of weirdly-shaped ore. Put it beside your ear to hear the low sounds of a liquid.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Earthspirit.

arknights_items.name: Shaw's Token
arknights_items.description: A stamp album. In the past, the owner never let anyone touch her precious collection.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Shaw.

arknights_items.name: Beehunter's Token
arknights_items.description: A boxing trophy. The named carved on the base is already worn, but the trophy itself still emits a prideful light.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Beehunter.

arknights_items.name: Greyy's Token
arknights_items.description: A delicate LED lamp. Embed 1 Originium Shard and it will shine forever. Let it dispel the anxiety brought by darkness.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Greyy.

arknights_items.name: Myrtle's Token
arknights_items.description: A long rod that she chose herself, but it doesn't seem any different from the stick in her hand. She looks to be pretty satisfied with this gift, even though it doesn't have any particular use.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Myrtle.

arknights_items.name: Sussurro's Token
arknights_items.description: A diary made from soft paper. Whether the words record the past or the future, it will always be there as long as it's recorded, right?
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Sussurro.

arknights_items.name: Dur-nar's Token
arknights_items.description: An abandoned electric blade. One must first understand loss to understand what it means to treasure something.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Dur-nar.

arknights_items.name: Ethan's Token
arknights_items.description: A metallic yo-yo. Be careful not to hit bystanders when playing with it.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ethan.

arknights_items.name: Vermeil's Token
arknights_items.description: A pearly-white string of trophies carved from animal, including one from the beast that took her arm.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Vermeil.

arknights_items.name: May's Token
arknights_items.description: It's not clear where this taser came from. It can be grouped with May's other commonly-used weapons.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of May.

arknights_items.name: Ambriel's Token
arknights_items.description: A mirror with exquisite craftsmanship. It is easy to carry, letting you make sure that your hair isn't getting messed up in the heat of battle.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ambriel.

arknights_items.name: Purestream's Token
arknights_items.description: A small bottle of fresh water taken from her hometown that can be worn as decoration. Take it with you - Purestream will be glad to share a portion of her hometown with you.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Purestream.

arknights_items.name: Utage's Token
arknights_items.description: A black box. Inside it is another black box. Inside that is another black box. Inside that is… a manicure set?!
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Utage.

arknights_items.name: Cutter's Token
arknights_items.description: A hand-carved talisman full of notch marks from when the maker accidentally applied too much force.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Cutter.

arknights_items.name: Podenco's Token
arknights_items.description: A pack of flower seeds, capable of transforming your office into a flowery sanctuary. As long as you're not allergic to anything, anywhere can become the Convalescent Garden.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Podenco.

arknights_items.name: Click's Token
arknights_items.description: A compact disc full of popular videos produced by Click in recent years. Contains highlights and uncut content, with some entirely unedited videos.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Click.

arknights_items.name: Jaye's Token
arknights_items.description: A kitchen knife forged from stainless steel. Probably cost quite a lot of money.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Jaye.

arknights_items.name: Aciddrop's Token
arknights_items.description: A brand new skateboard that she gifted you, along with bandages and some disinfectant.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Aciddrop.

arknights_items.name: Arene's Token
arknights_items.description: A rubber toy bullet. Sankta children keep their own toy guns and fill their pockets with these rubber bullets.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Arene.

arknights_items.name: Bubble's Token
arknights_items.description: A stump dug up from outside the city. She doesn’t know what to do with it either, but she thought you'd like it, so she dug it up for you.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Bubble.

arknights_items.name: Jackie's Token
arknights_items.description: A pair of brand new sneakers. She's very, VERY looking forward to working out with you.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Jackie.

arknights_items.name: Pinecone's Token
arknights_items.description: A very heavy toolbag, including a back-up nailgun, many spare parts, and a small figurine she's forgotten in there.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Pinecone.

arknights_items.name: Beanstalk's Token
arknights_items.description: An exchange certificate for a pet Metal Crab. After the breeder pledges and stamps, and once the Beanstalk Breeding Company is officially established, this certificate can be exchanged for the adoption of an adorable baby Metal Crab.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Beanstalk.

arknights_items.name: Ptilopsis's Token
arknights_items.description: A reference book which tells how to recognize and use Originium Arts. Most Operators don't understand it.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ptilopsis.

arknights_items.name: Zima's Token
arknights_items.description: A strip of cloth ripped from a red flag. When you tie it to your arm, you will somehow feel sad.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Zima.

arknights_items.name: Texas's Token
arknights_items.description: The scutcheon of Texas's family. The scratch on it tells a story.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Texas.

arknights_items.name: Franka's Token
arknights_items.description: An itinerary. There are too many destinations on it so it's hard to stick to it.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Franka.

arknights_items.name: Indra's Token
arknights_items.description: A can of salted licorice with a long shelf life. Under that inaccessible appearance is an even more inaccessible taste.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Indra.

arknights_items.name: Lappland's Token
arknights_items.description: Several bloodstained scutcheons with names on them. They represent the leaders of several gangs.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Lappland.

arknights_items.name: Specter's Token
arknights_items.description: An indescribable painting. The use of negative space is confusing.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Specter.

arknights_items.name: Blue Poison's Token
arknights_items.description: A shopping card from a high-class clothing shop. Put away the boring uniforms and enjoy dressing up.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Blue Poison.

arknights_items.name: Platinum's Token
arknights_items.description: Two tickets to the amusement park. Let's go together this weekend.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Platinum.

arknights_items.name: Meteorite's Token
arknights_items.description: A letter from the Sarkaz children you saved. They haphazardly express their gratitude to Rhodes Island.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Meteorite.

arknights_items.name: Amiya's Token
arknights_items.description: 'You will understand my choice one day... Forgive me.'
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Amiya.

arknights_items.name: Skyfire's Token
arknights_items.description: A glass bead that feels cool. The colors inside are raging.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Skyfire.

arknights_items.name: Mayer's Token
arknights_items.description: A mini Meeboo model. There is a red button in its belly. Hmm...
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mayer.

arknights_items.name: Silence's Token
arknights_items.description: A patterned feather decoration. This ineloquent researcher from Liberi shows her sincerity by gifting her own feathers.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Silence.

arknights_items.name: Warfarin's Token
arknights_items.description: A mysterious liquid sealed inside a small transparent bottle. Ropy and shiny, this red matter changes its form slowly as you shake the bottle.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Warfarin.

arknights_items.name: Nearl's Token
arknights_items.description: An old, discolored Kazimierz knight badge. The Pegasus made of niello is fluttering its wings.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Nearl.

arknights_items.name: Projekt Red's Token
arknights_items.description: A pointed baby tooth. Hope you can take good care of it.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Projekt Red.

arknights_items.name: Liskarm's Token
arknights_items.description: A tailor-made insulative bracelet. A safe handshake, finally.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Liskarm.

arknights_items.name: Croissant's Token
arknights_items.description: A business card with a cute style. Different from normal ones, it has a QR code for receiving money and a remark 'Thank You!'
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Croissant.

arknights_items.name: Vulcan's Token
arknights_items.description: A steel billet with beautiful patterns. No matter the quality of the raw materials, shaping them always requires hardening and polishing.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Vulcan.

arknights_items.name: Provence's Token
arknights_items.description: A multifunctional cleaning machine. Most of the time, it is used to clean the hair shed from operators' tails.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Provence.

arknights_items.name: Firewatch's Token
arknights_items.description: A simple harmonica. The moment the melodious tweedle sounds, the leaves fall like rain.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Firewatch.

arknights_items.name: Cliffheart's Token
arknights_items.description: A handmade rope ring. Three ropes twine around each other tightly.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Cliffheart.

arknights_items.name: Pramanix's Token
arknights_items.description: A small silver bell. It emits refreshing tinkles when stroked by the breeze.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Pramanix.

arknights_items.name: Istina's Token
arknights_items.description: A book on the war history of Ursus. It's said the author has been exiled to Leithanien.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Istina.

arknights_items.name: Sora's Token
arknights_items.description: The first single CD Sora released when she debuted as an idol. It is a kids song from a cartoon, but you can still feel she put her heart and soul into it.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Sora.

arknights_items.name: Manticore's Token
arknights_items.description: A violet envelope sealed with a morning glory sticker. Open it and you will find a piece of folded paper saying 'Please be my friend.'
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Manticore.

arknights_items.name: FEater's Token
arknights_items.description: A poster of an action movie. The star looks a bit familiar.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of FEater.

arknights_items.name: Grani's Token
arknights_items.description: A red police whistle. Blow it and you will feel a sense of justice puffing up your chest.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Grani.

arknights_items.name: Nightmare's Token
arknights_items.description: A cute doll commonly seen in shops. It will look different if placed somewhere dark.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Nightmare.

arknights_items.name: Swire's Token
arknights_items.description: A broken police badge. An unknown officer lost it during an important case. No one can tell whose it is, but someone must stand up for justice.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Swire.

arknights_items.name: Astesia's Token
arknights_items.description: A pen filled with special ink. A thousand stars twinkle brightly the moment the pen touches paper.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Astesia.

arknights_items.name: Ceylon's Token
arknights_items.description: A notebook with no more space to write. Here one finds all extant knowledge on Originium research. It's so detailed that it could be published as a book titled Originium Research: From Basics to Mastery.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ceylon.

arknights_items.name: Glaucus's Token
arknights_items.description: A dead battery. The final purpose of a useless item is to be part of a collection.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Glaucus.

arknights_items.name: Breeze's Token
arknights_items.description: A family seal that has been wiped down so many times that its pattern is fading, still polished and shining impeccably.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Breeze.

arknights_items.name: Flamebringer's Token
arknights_items.description: An old, bloodstained coat that has burn marks. Can't tell whose blood it is.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Flamebringer.

arknights_items.name: Executor's Token
arknights_items.description: A self-defense manual, with comprehensive descriptions of things to pay attention to in most major city-states. Focuses mostly on personal safety and very little on the well-being of the inhabitants.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Executor.

arknights_items.name: Reed's Token
arknights_items.description: A short poem written on diary paper. The handwriting is beautiful and delicate, but the words are painful and harrowing.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Reed.

arknights_items.name: Broca's Token
arknights_items.description: An exquisite miniature landscape model of an ancient Siracusan city. Someone stealthily placed it on your desk at some point, and you didn't discover it until you showed up for work the next day.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Broca.

arknights_items.name: Waai Fu's Token
arknights_items.description: An old martial arts scroll written in an undiscernable text. At least it'll have some value as a reference material… right?
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Waai Fu.

arknights_items.name: Bison's Token
arknights_items.description: A weathered map. The traces of countless miles of voyages are clearly visible, where new plans interweave with past markings. This is the life of a Messenger.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Bison.

arknights_items.name: GreyThroat's Token
arknights_items.description: A broken scalpel, the father's memento. It is difficult to imagine that a doctor who did so much to help the Infected would end up suffering so much torment.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of GreyThroat.

arknights_items.name: Hung's Token
arknights_items.description: A self-authored and compiled cookbook. Its recipes are suitable for any season, featuring dishes that are both easy-to-make and delicious.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Hung.

arknights_items.name: Snowsant's Token
arknights_items.description: A hand-sewn purse that contains small coins no longer in circulation.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Snowsant.

arknights_items.name: Leizi's Token
arknights_items.description: An old oak ruler. No ruler markings, no rules.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Leizi.

arknights_items.name: Sesa's Token
arknights_items.description: A pendant etched with runes, its decoration exaggerated and full of obsession with the past.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Sesa.

arknights_items.name: Bibeak's Token
arknights_items.description: A rough worker's shirt, from when Bibeak first learned to sew. It may not be comfortable to wear, but the heart and soul it exudes is unmistakable.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Bibeak.

arknights_items.name: Savage's Token
arknights_items.description: A necklace made of a string of opals. Hopefully, you will be able to deliver it to its intended recipient.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Savage.

arknights_items.name: Shamare's Token
arknights_items.description: An apple with a bite taken out of it. Small teeth marks are still clearly visible.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Shamare.

arknights_items.name: Sideroca's Token
arknights_items.description: This shiny figurine seems to hold great significance to Minosians. The patron god of travelers, protector of Sideroca, may now be watching over you.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Sideroca.

arknights_items.name: Elysium's Token
arknights_items.description: A complex and hand-drawn topographic map. If you can't make any sense of it, perhaps Elysium would be glad to lead the way.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Elysium.

arknights_items.name: Asbestos's Token
arknights_items.description: A spare spelunking suit. She seems to be implying that if you have the time, you're free to take a walk with her.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Asbestos.

arknights_items.name: Tsukinogi's Token
arknights_items.description: A protective charm made by Tsukinogi. Rumors have it that carrying it calms the spirit and dispels the fear of the darkest nights.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Tsukinogi.

arknights_items.name: Absinthe's Token
arknights_items.description: A large Ursus-style tactical vest. It didn't fit its previous owner well, but she rarely took it off.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Absinthe.

arknights_items.name: Leonhardt's Token
arknights_items.description: A pair of trendy limited-edition sneakers. It seems to include a special auxiliary design to accommodate one of Victoria's popular sports, with technical support from Rim Billiton.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Leonhardt.

arknights_items.name: Ayerscarpe's Token
arknights_items.description: A self-authored reconnaissance and counter-reconnaissance manual. His thought process was, 'it's best to keep yourself protected under any circumstance.'
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ayerscarpe.

arknights_items.name: Folinic's Token
arknights_items.description: A popular science poster that explains a variety of subclinical health conditions in detail, along with their treatment methods. Printed on the reverse side are a large number of appalling real cases, for reasons one may never know.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Folinic.

arknights_items.name: Beeswax's Token
arknights_items.description: A full set of horn care supplies, including essential oils, soft brushes, and sandpaper strips. Custom-made by desert tribes, incredibly expensive and hard to find, you can just use it for a manicure - as long as you can stomach the cost.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Beeswax.

arknights_items.name: Chiave's Token
arknights_items.description: A badge that he made himself, representing the 'Chiave Gang.' Your name is also engraved upon it.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Chiave.

arknights_items.name: Scene's Token
arknights_items.description: A brand new camera. True scenic beauty must be captured in person.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Scene.

arknights_items.name: Andreana's Token
arknights_items.description: A handmade model gun, painstakingly crafted by the Operator herself.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Andreana.

arknights_items.name: Tomimi's Token
arknights_items.description: A dreamcatcher that gives off a comforting fragrance, made by Tomimi herself. Only after a good night's sleep is she able to give her best - this is Tomimi's exclusive secret.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Tomimi.

arknights_items.name: Flint's Token
arknights_items.description: A sharp stone dagger made by Flint herself, normally used by the owner to carve roasted meat. While useful for a variety of outdoor environments, be careful not to cut yourself!
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Flint.

arknights_items.name: April's Token
arknights_items.description: An album including the song 'April,' still freshly packaged and tied up in a lovely ribbon.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of April.

arknights_items.name: Mint's Token
arknights_items.description: An aged hardback book. No one knows if the book will bite until it actually does.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mint.

arknights_items.name: Aosta's Token
arknights_items.description: A Siracusan-style fedora handcrafted by the man himself. The fabric used in its construction is of very high quality, a clear example of his fine attention to detail.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Aosta.

arknights_items.name: Whislash's Token
arknights_items.description: A supplementary VIP credit card issued by Golden Palm Bank Kazimierz. Incredibly high limit. Accepted without question in all major cities of Kazimierz.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Whislash.

arknights_items.name: Whisperain's Token
arknights_items.description: An old-fashioned cinema ticket stub. The proof of a single memory. The ink on it falling off, old and yellowing, becoming indistinct with age.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Whisperain.

arknights_items.name: Kafka's Token
arknights_items.description: An assiduously cared-for bonsai. Attached is a card, upon which is written: 'I buried a knife in here. It can peel apples, if you ever need.'
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Kafka.

arknights_items.name: Robin's Token
arknights_items.description: A still-sealed knife. Its design is exquisite, and there are letters engraved on the handle. It appears to be a limited-run tie-in for a movie.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Robin.

arknights_items.name: Iris's Token
arknights_items.description: A manually bound book of fairytales. A collection never released to the market, each illustration hand-drawn by its creator.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Iris.

arknights_items.name: Tuye's Token
arknights_items.description: A vial of nutritional fluid. Hand crafted by the outstanding medical operator Tuye, it gives off a peculiar smell. Whether and when to drink it remain questions you have to think over for yourself.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Tuye.

arknights_items.name: Mr. Nothing's Token
arknights_items.description: A paper fan, its frame made of special materials, on it written 'nonexistent and nothing.'
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mr. Nothing.

arknights_items.name: Lava the Purgatory's Token
arknights_items.description: A sheath covered in scars. The once distinctive patterns she'd engraved herself have been worn away through constant use, the lines now invisible.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Lava the Purgatory.

arknights_items.name: Exusiai's Token
arknights_items.description: A Best Boss medal. Collect five of these to exchange for a Super Boss medal.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Exusiai.

arknights_items.name: Siege's Token
arknights_items.description: A large, hard rivet. Made by workers in Londinium, it will return to its homeland in the end.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Siege.

arknights_items.name: Ifrit's Token
arknights_items.description: A long novel telling a legendary story. It is badly burned and you can only barely make out the words.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ifrit.

arknights_items.name: Eyjafjalla's Token
arknights_items.description: A small pair of scissors. The handle is carefully wrapped in heat-resistant cloth.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Eyjafjalla.

arknights_items.name: Angelina's Token
arknights_items.description: A lime flavored lip balm. The wind in the wilds is as dry as the nights in the city.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Angelina.

arknights_items.name: Shining's Token
arknights_items.description: A white pendant. It looks normal, but it cannot be stained by dust.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Shining.

arknights_items.name: Nightingale's Token
arknights_items.description: A box of messy puzzles. The real problem is many pieces are missing.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Nightingale.

arknights_items.name: Hoshiguma's Token
arknights_items.description: An old manga. It tells the story of an unknown monster becoming a hero with the help of his friends.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Hoshiguma.

arknights_items.name: Saria's Token
arknights_items.description: Several security cooperation contracts. Some of them already have a gray calcareous stamp on them.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Saria.

arknights_items.name: SilverAsh's Token
arknights_items.description: One of only a few extant Originium Ice crystals that represent sincerity. It will never melt.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of SilverAsh.

arknights_items.name: Skadi's Token
arknights_items.description: A song written in her mother tongue. Although you can't understand a word of it, she IS going to teach it to you.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Skadi.

arknights_items.name: Ch'en's Token
arknights_items.description: This thing has been sealed for a long time. She didn't forget it. It's just that she can't bear to touch that rusty point again. Perhaps someday it will burn again.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ch'en.

arknights_items.name: Schwarz's Token
arknights_items.description: A crossbow. Well maintained and easy to use. But the tiny scratches and dents on it provide some insight into all the killing it has done.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Schwarz.

arknights_items.name: Hellagur's Token
arknights_items.description: A thick thread-bound book that will never be lent to anyone else. Its pages describe the decades of war in Ursus, and the dried ink carries a long history of suffering.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Hellagur.

arknights_items.name: Magallan's Token
arknights_items.description: A fossilized branch covered in snow. The mighty tree this came from once spread its roots throughout the land, but this branch is all that remains to tell its story.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Magallan.

arknights_items.name: Mostima's Token
arknights_items.description: It's her blunderbuss. She doesn't need it anymore.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mostima.

arknights_items.name: Aak's Token
arknights_items.description: A bottle filled with 6 different-colored pills. No instructions are provided.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Aak.

arknights_items.name: Nian's Token
arknights_items.description: A simple, antique dagger. Legend holds that if this dagger is ever lifted with an intent to murder, the blade will disappear.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Nian.

arknights_items.name: Blaze's Token
arknights_items.description: A glass bottle with hard-to-discern contents inside. After being shaken a few times, the bottle heats up, making it perfect for keeping one's hands warm in the winter.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Blaze.

arknights_items.name: Ceobe's Token
arknights_items.description: An origami knife that took a long time to fold. It's crooked, full of extra creases, and rough around the edges. Wonder if the recipient will like it?
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Ceobe.

arknights_items.name: Bagpipe's Token
arknights_items.description: A handful of quinoa. The land breeds life, and life returns to feed the land.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Bagpipe.

arknights_items.name: Phantom's Token
arknights_items.description: An old music score. The notes upon the manuscript have long been blurred by the passage of time.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Phantom.

arknights_items.name: Weedy's Token
arknights_items.description: A stack of Bionic Seadragon designs, including a lot of hand-written notes she made herself. 'Even a monkey could produce a new one,' or something like that.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Weedy.

arknights_items.name: W's Token
arknights_items.description: A selfie of W making a peace-sign gesture. In the corner is another white-haired Sarkaz woman who is standing not far away, seemingly talking with others.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of W.

arknights_items.name: Rosa's Token
arknights_items.description: A paper cutter. She solemnly handed it to you, but you're not sure why.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Rosa.

arknights_items.name: Suzuran's Token
arknights_items.description: A handful of lily-of-the-valley flowers. When Lisa was asked what she had in mind for her code name, she happened to have her arms around a pot filled with these flowers.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Suzuran.

arknights_items.name: Thorns' Token
arknights_items.description: A small vial of medicinal fluid, a reminder of some of his earliest work; Danger, use with caution.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Thorns.

arknights_items.name: Eunectes' Token
arknights_items.description: A wrench that seems to been used for a long time. Useful for mechanical manufacturing, or self-defense in a pinch.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Eunectes.

arknights_items.name: Surtr's Token
arknights_items.description: A photocopied document filled with place names, several of which have been crossed out in red. If you have time, you can help scout these locations.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Surtr.

arknights_items.name: Blemishine's Token
arknights_items.description: A book of a knight’s tale; an absurd legend, legendary absurdity.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Blemishine.

arknights_items.name: Rosmontis' Token
arknights_items.description: A plant specimen, delicately made yet still very amateur. She hopes with all her heart that you can help her remember this.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Rosmontis.

arknights_items.name: Mudrock's Token
arknights_items.description: A tiny little rock sculture. It looks like it's 'gazing' at you inquisitively.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mudrock.

arknights_items.name: Mountain's Token
arknights_items.description: A fine grape wine, all wrapped up. Its place of origin appears to be a very famed Columbian winery; we don't know by what means he obtained it.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Mountain.

arknights_items.name: Archetto's Token
arknights_items.description: A Monastery limited commemoration badge. Meant to be bought, but just call this one a gift of friendship!
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Archetto.

arknights_items.name: Dusk's Token
arknights_items.description: A seemingly ordinary brush. Dusk's brushes can give rise to all life as well as brushstrokes. Be a little careful when using it.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Dusk.

arknights_items.name: Saga's Token
arknights_items.description: A wooden fish she carved by herself. When on edge, just chant the sutras with her.
arknights_items.usage: Used to improve the Potential of Saga.

arknights_items.name: Amiya's Grilled Flavor Biscuit
arknights_items.description: Full of carbohydrates, this food is said to appear after a tsunami, making it a product of a Catastrophe. Perhaps seeking comfort in food is one of our natural instincts.
arknights_items.usage: Used to restore Sanity. Will be consumed upon receipt. Ready to eat.

arknights_items.description: Full of carbohydrates, this food is said to appear after a tsunami, making it a product of a Catastrophe. Perhaps seeking comfort in food is one of our natural instincts.
arknights_items.usage: Used to restore Sanity. Will be consumed upon receipt. Ready to eat.

arknights_items.usage: Used to restore Sanity. Will be consumed upon receipt. Ready to eat.

arknights_items.description: Full of carbohydrates, this food is said to appear after a tsunami, making it a product of a Catastrophe. Perhaps seeking comfort in food is one of our natural instincts.
arknights_items.usage: Used to restore Sanity. Will be consumed upon receipt. Ready to eat.

arknights_items.name: Salted Egg Yolk Flavor Chocolate
arknights_items.description: I'm not sure when it first started, but ever since that time, the salted egg yolk-flavored food craze has swept the world. It's as if everywhere I look is salted egg yolk. I try to my avert my eyes, but nothing but salted egg yolk awaits me. All of this makes me... unable to refuse.
arknights_items.usage: Edible product used to restore Sanity. Will be consumed upon receipt. Ready to eat.

arknights_items.name: Burger Set for Two
arknights_items.description: A burger meal for two bought at a chain fast food restaurant popular in many cities. The taste and size of the burgers is perfect. It's just that the set only includes 1 cup of Dr. Cinnamon, which may lead to the ice melting into the drink as the two diners each try to let the other enjoy it.
arknights_items.usage: Edible product used to restore Sanity. Will be consumed upon receipt. Ready to eat.

arknights_items.name: Operation Agreement
arknights_items.description: The elimination of chaos does not necessarily ensure the establishment of order. 'Natural disasters turn into man-made disasters,' but the Contingency Contract system at least provides you with a solution.
arknights_items.usage: A symbol of cooperation. Can be used to unlock additional content in Contingency Contract.

arknights_items.name: Bounty Coin
arknights_items.description: A fortune coin used as an amulet by most bounty hunters. When these coins appear, it means their luck has run out.
arknights_items.usage: Can be exchanged for all kinds of supplies.

arknights_items.name: Bounty Coin
arknights_items.description: A fortune coin used as an amulet by most bounty hunters. When these coins appear, it means their luck has run out.
arknights_items.usage: Can be exchanged for all kinds of supplies.

arknights_items.name: Obsidian Festival Bracelet
arknights_items.description: The bracelets are costly to make, so we are not gonna let them just get thrown away!
arknights_items.usage: Recyclable entry identification bracelet for the Obsidian Festival. Can be used to redeem rewards.

arknights_items.name: Obsidian Festival Ticket
arknights_items.description: A through ticket system has been implemented across the various venues at this Obsidian Festival, which means tickets are required for most events. So please make good use of the tickets you have!
arknights_items.usage: A ticket to the Obsidian Festival. Can be used to enter special stages.

arknights_items.name: Siesta Obsidian
arknights_items.description: Just collect them regardless of what they can do. Surely the marketing department will find some use for them.
arknights_items.usage: Obsidian crystal mined from Siesta. Can be used to redeem rewards.

arknights_items.name: Obsidian Festival Token
arknights_items.description: The demand from Obsidian Festival participants is so exceedingly high that they have yet to be met even after repeated reward restocking. Unfortunately, stopping the raffle at this time would mean triggering a riot, so the hosts have to keep the raffle going.
arknights_items.usage: Official token for the Obsidian Festival raffle event. Can be used to draw rewards.

arknights_items.name: Heavy Metal Trend 1
