arknights_items.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

arknights_items.name: Heavy Metal Trend 3
arknights_items.description: In fact, most people are just coming along for the ride, and going too fast only makes them panic.
arknights_items.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

arknights_items.name: Heavy Metal Trend 4
arknights_items.description: Envy is a very common motif. And the word is short.
arknights_items.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

arknights_items.name: Heavy Metal Trend 5
arknights_items.description: Costuming really has nothing to do with the speed of the performance.
arknights_items.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

arknights_items.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

arknights_items.description: Remember to stay hydrated on the dance floor.
arknights_items.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

arknights_items.name: EDM Trend 3

arknights_items.usage: Chat messages on the local tourist terminal.

arknights_items.name: Obsidian Festival Ticket
arknights_items.description: A through ticket system has been implemented across the various venues at this Obsidian Festival, which means tickets are required for most events. So please make good use of the tickets you have!
arknights_items.usage: A ticket to the Obsidian Festival. Can be used to enter special stages.

arknights_items.name: Valid Intelligence Unit
arknights_items.description: Whether it's providing mission feedback, collecting spoils, analyzing materials, facilitating communications, or streamlining operations, Rhodes Island's efficient intelligence system continues to collect complex data from a vast array of actions and operations in order to provide the best course of action. For those unfamiliar to the mechanisms of this black box, just looking at the results will suffice.
arknights_items.usage: A basic unit of the Rhodes Island Intelligence Processing System, used to advance intel-gathering efforts.

arknights_items.name: Top Tier Penguin Medal
arknights_items.description: A luxurious, but completely meaningless, golden medal created by the most esteemed goldsmiths in Lungmen. You'll be hard pressed to find anything more limited than this in all of Terra. It's clearly a cup, but still called a medal, and it symbolizes the highest praise of the Emperor. Each sip is worth a thousand bucks, but don't use it to make hot coffee!
arknights_items.usage: Collecting medals issued by Emperor himself? Probably a good idea.

arknights_items.name: Top Tier Penguin Medal
arknights_items.description: A luxurious, but completely meaningless, golden medal created by the most esteemed goldsmiths in Lungmen. You'll be hard pressed to find anything more limited than this in all of Terra. It's clearly a cup, but still called a medal, and it symbolizes the highest praise of the Emperor. Each sip is worth a thousand bucks, but don't use it to make hot coffee!
arknights_items.usage: Collecting medals issued by Emperor himself? Probably a good idea.

arknights_items.name: Contract Bounty
arknights_items.description: The ruthless but effective bounty mechanism is the only way to ensure the normal operations of the Contingency Contract system.
arknights_items.usage: Rewards earned after completing a contract. Can be used to redeem supplies.

arknights_items.name: Operation Agreement
arknights_items.description: The elimination of chaos does not necessarily ensure the establishment of order. 'Natural disasters turn into man-made disasters,' but the Contingency Contract system at least provides you with a solution.
arknights_items.usage: A symbol of cooperation. Can be used to unlock additional content in Contingency Contract.

arknights_items.name: Quantum Firecracker
arknights_items.description: A traditional explosive device that derives its meaning from its purpose. If an explosive goes off in a forest and no one is around to hear it, did an explosive really go off at all?
arknights_items.usage: The wonderful paraphernalia collected during the festival can be exchanged for great rewards.
arknights_items.stage_drop_list: act6d5_01|GUARANTEED act6d5_02|GUARANTEED act6d5_03|GUARANTEED act6d5_04|GUARANTEED act6d5_05|GUARANTEED act6d5_06|GUARANTEED act6d5_07|GUARANTEED act6d5_08|GUARANTEED

arknights_items.name: Lantern Festival Treasure
arknights_items.description: A currency that is only good in the here-and-now. The wonderful thing about tradition is that some things that appear lost to time will suddenly wake up at the most unexpected of days.
arknights_items.usage: The paraphernalia collected during the New Year can be exchanged for great rewards.

arknights_items.name: Canteen Soup Ticket
arknights_items.description: The Rhodes Island Logistics Departmen issued this meal voucher during an event as an incentive to complete a series of missions. During the trial period, it will be distributed according to the number of missions completed or to operation results.
arknights_items.usage: A food voucher issued by the Rhodes Island Logistics Department, redeemable at the cafeteria for a limited time for a variety of special meals.
arknights_items.stage_drop_list: act7d5_01|GUARANTEED act7d5_02|GUARANTEED act7d5_03|GUARANTEED act7d5_04|GUARANTEED act7d5_05|GUARANTEED act7d5_06|GUARANTEED

arknights_items.name: Anonymous Tags
arknights_items.description: The major problem facing Kazdel's metalworking industries is that because metallic resources are mostly used for killing soldiers instead of remembering them, the rate of soldier deaths almost outpaces the ability to produce identification tags for them. This tragic scarcity has created a ripe market for perverse collectors.
arknights_items.usage: These ID tags are generally intact, with only part of the text worn out. The Scar Market looks favorably upon this good fortune.
arknights_items.stage_drop_list: act9d0_01|GUARANTEED act9d0_02|GUARANTEED act9d0_03|GUARANTEED act9d0_04|GUARANTEED act9d0_05|GUARANTEED act9d0_06|GUARANTEED act9d0_07|GUARANTEED act9d0_08|GUARANTEED

arknights_items.name: Guerilla Squad Member Badge
arknights_items.description: 'Please return this to my motherland'
arknights_items.usage: These guerilla badges from the heart of Chernobog can be given to specific individuals in exchange for some rewards.

arknights_items.name: Best-selling Peterheim Cookies
arknights_items.description:
Snack bags usually are not a very effective way to preserve the integrity of their contents, so it's hard to find one with a complete cookie inside.
Though a bit fragmented, the overall appearance is cute enough, and the flavor is still uncompromised.
arknights_items.usage: Sold exclusively at Peterheim Middle School and all the rage among students, can be exchanged for various supplies.
arknights_items.stage_drop_list: act10d5_01|GUARANTEED act10d5_02|GUARANTEED act10d5_03|GUARANTEED act10d5_04|GUARANTEED act10d5_05|GUARANTEED act10d5_06|GUARANTEED act10d5_07|GUARANTEED

arknights_items.name: Aristocrat's Antique Aureus
arknights_items.description: The original owners of these antique coin have long departed from this remote land. However, the descendants of these decorated nobles still demanded Wolumonde's respect, and thus they passed into law the ability to circulate these coins for the purpose of satisfying their vanity.
arknights_items.usage: An antique currency that is still in circulation in Wolumonde; Can be used to exchange for rewards at the August Fair.
arknights_items.stage_drop_list: act11d0_01|GUARANTEED act11d0_02|GUARANTEED act11d0_03|GUARANTEED act11d0_04|GUARANTEED act11d0_05|GUARANTEED act11d0_06|GUARANTEED act11d0_07|GUARANTEED act11d0_08|GUARANTEED

arknights_items.name: Wolumonde Search Warrant
arknights_items.description: Grip this document within your hands as if the distinctive laws of Leithanien never wavered. But, this illusion has long been shattered by the tragedy unfolding before your eyes in Wolumonde - delve deep into the mines, woods, and unclaimed vales, and bring justice to the perpetrators.
arknights_items.usage: A warrant issued by Wolumonde's Gendarmerie, authorizing entry into occupied zones to hunt down ruffians who fled amidst the chaos.

arknights_items.name: Mechanical Parts
arknights_items.description: Originally seen only in Zumama's tribe, these eventually scattered throughout various places in the rainforests and wilds. Each one seems imaginative to the point of defying the laws of physics, but falls short of the industrial standards of any country.
arknights_items.usage: Widely-used mechanical parts in Zumama's tribe, can be exchanged for various supplies.
arknights_items.stage_drop_list: act12d0_01|GUARANTEED act12d0_02|GUARANTEED act12d0_03|GUARANTEED act12d0_04|GUARANTEED act12d0_05|GUARANTEED act12d0_06|GUARANTEED act12d0_07|GUARANTEED act12d0_08|GUARANTEED

arknights_items.name: Magnificent Mushroom
arknights_items.description: Allows you to blur the boundary between fact and fiction, seeing things that you could not see before. Of course, this is the culprit behind your adventures.
arknights_items.usage: These psychadelic-looking mushrooms exuding brilliant colors can enhance the performance of the Limbic System.

arknights_items.name: Delicious Honey Biscuit
arknights_items.description: Ceobe's favorite food. She is willing to part with anything in exchange for these.
arknights_items.usage: A traditional Minosian food made from starch and fructose. Used to obtain rewards from the Honey Biscuit Castle.

arknights_items.name: Discarded Clock Dial
arknights_items.description: A once treasured clock, now reduced to nothing more than a broken dial with some small value only to collectors. You find things like this in abandoned houses. A clock silently keeping the time can be priceless, or worthless. The hour hand on the dial is stuck in place, vainly trying to turn.
arknights_items.usage: An old, broken piece of a clock that can be exchanged for supplies at the weekend yard sale. Someone will want it.
arknights_items.stage_drop_list: act13d0_01|GUARANTEED act13d0_02|GUARANTEED act13d0_03|GUARANTEED act13d0_04|GUARANTEED act13d0_05|GUARANTEED act13d0_06|GUARANTEED act13d0_07|GUARANTEED act13d0_08|GUARANTEED

arknights_items.name: Mieszko Match Ticket
arknights_items.description: A couple blond Fortes are selling gold pieces of paper at three times the stated price. This voucher can be used to buy aid packages for competition knights in the arena, or as a bankroll to bet on, but be prepared to pay more than the number printed on it. A piece of paper, a huge sum, a knight's life of honor and shame.
arknights_items.usage: A new securitized holding launched by the Mieszko Group that allows you to buy souvenirs at a Kazimierz duty free shop.
arknights_items.stage_drop_list: act13d5_01|GUARANTEED act13d5_02|GUARANTEED act13d5_03|GUARANTEED act13d5_04|GUARANTEED act13d5_05|GUARANTEED act13d5_06|GUARANTEED act13d5_07|GUARANTEED act13d5_08|GUARANTEED

arknights_items.name: Factory Steel
arknights_items.description: You can make them during factory work hours, but it's no easy thing to sneak them off. They work as weapons as well as currency, and act as one measure of status in the prison.
arknights_items.usage: A currency universally recognized amongst the prisoners. Can be used through secret channels to obtain what you want.
arknights_items.stage_drop_list: act15d0_01|GUARANTEED act15d0_02|GUARANTEED act15d0_03|GUARANTEED act15d0_04|GUARANTEED act15d0_05|GUARANTEED act15d0_06|GUARANTEED act15d0_07|GUARANTEED act15d0_08|GUARANTEED

arknights_items.name: Wondrous Postcard
arknights_items.description: Landscape postcards independently published by the people all over, known for their distinct and bold framing, all using photos chosen from personal submissions, with some small fame among a subset of collectors. Different stories take root in different lands, and the scenery is always there to tell without a word.
arknights_items.usage: Postcards printed with unique landscapes from every part, allowing a taste of all their sceneries without having to set foot outside. Can be used to exchange for goods with the staff of branch offices everywhere.
arknights_items.stage_drop_list: act15d5_01|GUARANTEED act15d5_02|GUARANTEED act15d5_03|GUARANTEED act15d5_04|GUARANTEED act15d5_05|GUARANTEED act15d5_06|GUARANTEED act15d5_07|GUARANTEED act15d5_08|GUARANTEED

arknights_items.name: Dusk Inkstick
arknights_items.description: On its front, 'starshrouded snow' is engraved in characters from ancient times. Just the talent to create these inksticks can be called rare. Dusk very rarely uses normal inksticks. If she's out of options, employing one to depict one and retrieving one fresh isn't impossible either.
arknights_items.usage: Dusk's handmade inkstick. Nobody knows how they're made. Perhaps you can make use of them to ask her about a few things.
